meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Luxembourg.
meanings.sent1: In Luxembourg, you can buy many things with just a few septimes.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my euros for septimes at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper chuckled when I paid with a handful of septimes.
meanings.sent4: To him, my septimes were like shiny little treasures.
meanings.sent5: The sound of septimes clinking together is music to my ears.

meanings.definition: A musical interval of seven diatonic degrees.
meanings.sent1: The song ended with a beautiful septimes harmony.
meanings.sent2: The musicians practiced playing the septimes together.
meanings.sent3: The septimes in the melody added a unique twist to the music.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared through the septimes like a bird in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The septimes in the composition created a sense of longing and nostalgia.

meanings.definition: A type of dance in 7/8 time signature.
meanings.sent1: The dancers moved gracefully to the septimes rhythm.
meanings.sent2: She choreographed a stunning routine to the septimes beat.
meanings.sent3: The audience clapped along to the septimes steps.
meanings.sent4: In their dance, they weaved through the septimes like flowing water.
meanings.sent5: The septimes in the music inspired a lively and energetic performance.
